metadata.synopsis: Two nobles in Jannath Estate argue and finally come to blows. This oneliner is for if AngryNoble_002 is the survivor or if both nobles were calmed down. This noble was the one who purchased the fake painting.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Players get close to arguing nobles in the dining room CTY_Main_A -248; 25; -512)Interact with any of the nobles, then follow them outside3) Interact with a noble during the AD4) End second dialog and have them fight or leave5) Talk to Noble 2

0.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
0.text: He was a stubborn fool to the last.  All I wanted was a refund...
0.context: NodeContext: Bitter, tinged with sadness - didn't want to kill his friend.

1.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
1.text: Everybody saw, the duel was of Lord Delwaer's making, not mine. I have nothing to be sorry for.
1.context: NodeContext: Bitter, tinged with sadness - didn't want to kill his friend.

2.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
2.text: Take my advice - never buy from your friends. Very hard to get a refund.

3.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
3.text: A shame. I was rather in the mood for a spot of fisticuffs.
